26#ifdef max

29#ifdef min

32template<class T>
33inline T max(T a, T b)
34{
35 return a > b ? a : b;
36}
37template<class T>
38inline T max(T a, T b, T c)
39{
40 return max(max(a, b), c);
41}
42template<class T>
43inline T min(T a, T b)
44{
45 return a < b ? a : b;
46}
47template<class T>
48inline T min(T a, T b, T c)
49{
50 return min(min(a, b), c);
51}

53#ifdef __GNUC__
54 #define BITSCAN(mask) (__builtin_ffs(mask)-1)
55#else
56 #ifdef WIN32
57 #pragma intrinsic(_BitScanForward)
58 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
59 {
60 ulong i;
61 return _BitScanForward(&i, mask) ? i : -1;
62 }
63 #else
64 inline int BITSCAN(uint mask)
65 {
66 if(!mask) return -1;
67 int i = 1;
68 if(!(mask&0xFFFF)) { i += 16; mask >>= 16; }
69 if(!(mask&0xFF)) { i += 8; mask >>= 8; }
70 if(!(mask&0xF)) { i += 4; mask >>= 4; }
71 if(!(mask&3)) { i += 2; mask >>= 2; }
72 return i - (mask&1);
73 }
74 #endif
75#endif

77inline int randomint(int x)
78{
79 return rand()%(x);
80}
81inline float randomfloat(int x)
82{
83 return (float((rand()*float(x))/float(RAND_MAX)));
84}
85//1103515245+12345 are magic constants for LCG psuedorandom generator
86inline float detrnd(uint s, int x)
87{
88 return static_cast<int>(((s*1103515245+12345)>>16)%x);
89}

134inline void vformatstring(char *d, const char *fmt, va_list v, int len) { _vsnprintf(d, len, fmt, v); d[len-1] = 0; }
135
136template<size_t N>
137inline void vformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, va_list v) { vformatstring(d, fmt, v, N); }
138
139inline char *copystring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len)
140{
141 size_t slen = min(strlen(s), len-1);
142 std::memcpy(d, s, slen);
143 d[slen] = 0;
144 return d;
145}
146template<size_t N>
147inline char *copystring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return copystring(d, s, N); }
148
149inline char *concatstring(char *d, const char *s, size_t len) { size_t used = strlen(d); return used < len ? copystring(d+used, s, len-used) : d; }
150
151template<size_t N>
152inline char *concatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *s) { return concatstring(d, s, N); }

154inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(3, 4);
155inline void nformatstring(char *d, int len, const char *fmt, ...)
156{
157 va_list v;
158 va_start(v, fmt);
159 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, len);
160 va_end(v);
161}

163template<size_t N>
164inline void formatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);
165
166template<size_t N>
167inline void formatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
168{
169 va_list v;
170 va_start(v, fmt);
171 vformatstring(d, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N));
172 va_end(v);
173}
174
175template<size_t N>
176inline void concformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);
177
178template<size_t N>
179inline void concformatstring(char (&d)[N], const char *fmt, ...)
180{
181 va_list v;
182 va_start(v, fmt);
183 int len = strlen(d);
184 vformatstring(d + len, fmt, v, static_cast<int>(N) - len);
185 va_end(v);
186}

190#define DEF_FORMAT_STRING(d,...) string d; formatstring(d, __VA_ARGS__)
191#define DEFV_FORMAT_STRING(d,last,fmt) string d; { va_list ap; va_start(ap, last); vformatstring(d, fmt, ap); va_end(ap); }

193template<size_t N>
194inline bool matchstring(const char *s, size_t len, const char (&d)[N])
195{
196 return len == N-1 && !std::memcmp(s, d, N-1);
197}
198
199inline char *newstring(size_t l)
200{
201 return new char[l+1];
202}
203inline char *newstring(const char *s, size_t l)
204{
205 return copystring(newstring(l), s, l+1);
206}
207inline char *newstring(const char *s)
208{
209 size_t l = strlen(s);
210 char *d = newstring(l);
211 std::memcpy(d, s, l+1);
212 return d;
213}
214
215inline char *newconcatstring(const char *s, const char *t)
216{
217 size_t slen = strlen(s),
218 tlen = strlen(t);
219 char *r = newstring(slen + tlen);
220 std::memcpy(r, s, slen);
221 std::memcpy(&r[slen], t, tlen);
222 r[slen+tlen] = '\0';
223 return r;
224}
225
226template <class T>
227struct databuf
228{
229 enum
230 {
231 OVERREAD = 1<<0,
232 OVERWROTE = 1<<1
233 };
234
235 T *buf;
236 int len, maxlen;
237 uchar flags;
238
239 databuf() : buf(nullptr), len(0), maxlen(0), flags(0) {}
240
241 template<class U>
242 databuf(T *buf, U maxlen) : buf(buf), len(0), maxlen((int)maxlen), flags(0) {}
243
244 void reset()
245 {
246 len = 0;
247 flags = 0;
248 }
249
250 void reset(T *buf_, int maxlen_)
251 {
252 reset();
253 buf = buf_;
254 maxlen = maxlen_;
255 }
256
257 const T &get()
258 {
259 static const T overreadval = 0;
260 if(len<maxlen)
261 {
262 return buf[len++];
263 }
264 flags |= OVERREAD;
265 return overreadval;
266 }
267
281 databuf subbuf(int sz)
282 {
283 sz = std::clamp(sz, 0, maxlen-len);
284 len += sz;
285 return databuf(&buf[len-sz], sz);
286 }
287
298 T *pad(int numvals)
299 {
300 T *vals = &buf[len];
301 len += min(numvals, maxlen-len);
302 return vals;
303 }
304
312 void put(const T &val)
313 {
314 if(len<maxlen)
315 {
316 buf[len++] = val;
317 }
318 else
319 {
320 flags |= OVERWROTE;
321 }
322 }
323
324 void put(const T *vals, int numvals)
325 {
326 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
327 {
328 numvals = maxlen - len;
329 flags |= OVERWROTE;
330 }
331 std::memcpy(&buf[len], (const void *)vals, numvals*sizeof(T));
332 len += numvals;
333 }
334
335 int get(T *vals, int numvals)
336 {
337 if(maxlen - len < numvals)
338 {
339 numvals = maxlen - len;
340 flags |= OVERREAD;
341 }
342 std::memcpy(vals, (void *)&buf[len], numvals*sizeof(T));
343 len += numvals;
344 return numvals;
345 }
346
347 void offset(int n)
348 {
349 n = min(n, maxlen);
350 buf += n;
351 maxlen -= n;
352 len = max(len-n, 0);
353 }
354
363 T *getbuf() const { return buf; }
364
371 bool empty() const { return len==0; }
372
381 int length() const { return len; }
382
392 int remaining() const { return maxlen-len; }
393
404 bool overread() const { return (flags&OVERREAD)!=0; }
405
415 bool overwrote() const { return (flags&OVERWROTE)!=0; }
416
417 bool check(int n) { return remaining() >= n; }
418
419 void forceoverread()
420 {
421 len = maxlen;
422 flags |= OVERREAD;
423 }
424};
425
426typedef databuf<char> charbuf;
427typedef databuf<uchar> ucharbuf;

429inline const char *stringptr(const char *s) { return s; }
430inline int stringlen(const char *s) { return static_cast<int>(strlen(s)); }
431
432inline uint memhash(const void *ptr, int len)
433{
434 const uchar *data = (const uchar *)ptr;
435 uint h = 5381;
436 for(int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(len); ++i)
437 {
438 h = ((h<<5)+h)^data[i];
439 }
440 return h;
441}
442
443template<class T>
444inline T endianswap(T n) { union { T t; uint i; } conv; conv.t = n; conv.i = SDL_Swap32(conv.i); return conv.t; }
445
446template<>
447inline uint endianswap<uint>(uint n) { return SDL_Swap32(n); }
448
449template<>
450inline int endianswap<int>(int n) { return SDL_Swap32(n); }

453#ifdef getchar

455#endif

458#endif

460struct stream
461{
462#ifdef WIN32
463 #if defined(__GNUC__) && !defined(__MINGW32__)
464 typedef off64_t offset;
465 #else
466 typedef __int64 offset;
467 #endif
468 #else
469 typedef off_t offset;
470#endif
471 //see file/gz/zipstream children for more interesting forms
472 virtual ~stream() {}
473 virtual void close() = 0;
474 virtual bool end() = 0;
475 virtual offset tell() { return -1; }
476 virtual offset rawtell() { return tell(); }
477 virtual bool seek(offset, int) { return false; }
478 virtual offset size();
479 virtual offset rawsize() { return size(); }
480 virtual size_t read(void *, size_t) { return 0; }
481 virtual size_t write(const void *, size_t) { return 0; }
482 virtual bool flush() { return true; }
483 virtual int getchar() { uchar c; return read(&c, 1) == 1 ? c : -1; }
484 virtual bool putchar(int n) { uchar c = n; return write(&c, 1) == 1; }
485 virtual bool getline(char *str, size_t len);
486 virtual bool putstring(const char *str) { size_t len = strlen(str); return write(str, len) == len; }
487 virtual bool putline(const char *str) { return putstring(str) && putchar('\n'); }
488 virtual size_t printf(const char *fmt, ...) PRINTFARGS(2, 3);
489 virtual uint getcrc() { return 0; }
490
491 template<class T>
492 size_t put(const T *v, size_t n) { return write(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
493
494 template<class T>
495 bool put(T n) { return write(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n); }
496
497 template<class T>
498 size_t get(T *v, size_t n) { return read(v, n*sizeof(T))/sizeof(T); }
499
500 template<class T>
501 T get() { T n; return read(&n, sizeof(n)) == sizeof(n) ? n : 0; }
502
503 template<class T>
504 bool putbig(T n) { return put<T>(endianswap(n)); }
505
506 SDL_RWops *rwops();
507};

531template<class T>
532inline void putint_(T &p, int n)
533{
534 if(n<128 && n>-127)
535 {
536 p.put(n);
537 }
538 else if(n<0x8000 && n>=-0x8000)
539 {
540 p.put(0x80);
541 p.put(n);
542 p.put(n>>8);
543 }
544 else
545 {
546 p.put(0x81);
547 p.put(n);
548 p.put(n>>8);
549 p.put(n>>16);
550 p.put(n>>24);
551 }
552}
553
554template<class T>
555inline void putuint_(T &p, int n)
556{
557 if(n < 0 || n >= (1<<21))
558 {
559 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
560 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
561 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 14) & 0x7F));
562 p.put(n >> 21);
563 }
564 else if(n < (1<<7))
565 {
566 p.put(n);
567 }
568 else if(n < (1<<14))
569 {
570 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
571 p.put(n >> 7);
572 }
573 else
574 {
575 p.put(0x80 | (n & 0x7F));
576 p.put(0x80 | ((n >> 7) & 0x7F));
577 p.put(n >> 14);
578 }
579}
580
581extern void putint(std::vector<uchar> &p, int n);

583template<typename T>
584inline void vectorput(std::vector<uint8_t>& buf, const T& data)
585{
586 const uint8_t* data_ptr = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(&data);
587 buf.insert(buf.end(), data_ptr, data_ptr + sizeof(T));
588}
589
590inline void vectorput(std::vector<uint8_t>& buf, const uint8_t* data, size_t size)
591{
592 buf.insert(buf.end(), data, data + size);
593}
594
595template<class T>
596inline void sendstring_(const char *t, T &p)
597{
598 while(*t)
599 {
600 putint(p, *t++);
601 }
602 putint(p, 0);
603}
604
605template<class T>
606inline void putfloat_(T &p, float f)
607{
608 p.put((uchar *)&f, sizeof(float));
609}
